subject: Refactoring and Test codes
msgSnippet: Hi all, i m seeking some documentation or papers about impacts of extensive code refactoring on testcode design. Are there some tricks you shouldn t do in your
messageBody:
Hi all,

i'm seeking some documentation or papers about impacts of extensive code refactoring on testcode design.
Are there some tricks you shouldn't do in your test code to be more flexible ?
About your experience, how much time do you spend to refactor your test code versus your code ?
What about mock objects strategy when you refactor your code a lot ?
Are there invariants in testing design that allow to refactor your code and impact less your test code ?

regards,

bruce vinchon.
